data.title: F&M Ballarin – Murano glass production – Murano glass production
data.text:
MURANO ARTISTIC GLASS

Since 1956, F&M Ballarin has been creating Murano glass art from the combination of knowledge handed down over the centuries and today’s modern innovations: a perfect balance between craftsmanship and technology.

THE LIGHT: A DECORATIVE WAY OF EXPRESSION

F&M Ballarin creatively interprets the shapes and functions of light, without ever losing sight of its meaning: to illuminate home environments.

LISTENING TO CLIENTS

We believe that listening is an essential part of any process. For this reason, F&M Ballarin is committed to listening and interpreting the requests of its clients to create, where possible, customized works of art. Thus, colors, shapes and sizes can be customized to suit your tastes.

Tradition and Creativity

F&M Ballarin pays homage to the famous Murano glass processing by creating handmade works of art that respect the past and convey the values of this ancient and magnificent tradition around the world.

SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER

Stay updated on F&M Ballarin news.

We will not intrude.

You will receive our email only when we have news to share.
